body:
Definitely, yes.

Any tips on how to submit patches to multiple branches are appreciated.
Perhaps I could have made the modifications to all three branches
(3-1/3-2/master) and submitted three pull requests? I'm a bit new to git
and didn't know if there was a more elegant way to do it.

Thanks!

On Mon, Feb 20, 2012 at 12:22 PM, Arun Agrawal <
reply@reply.github.com
> wrote:

> Do we need to backport this into 3-1-stable and 3-2-stable ??
>
> ---
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
> https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/5096#issuecomment-4057801
>
